column4: Hi, I'm having some issues with my LCDs, on whatever ubuntu version I have I keep on getting wierd stripes on it that go all fuzzy, it's not the videocard because VNC sessions and CRT monitors work fine but both of my LCDs really can't work with it normally, can anyone help me with that ?
have you checked / tried changing your refresh rate ?
yeah, 60, 70 and 75 all result into chaos
someone suggested that it's because of the intel+sis graphics, but then why does it work with CRT monitors ?
